### JEP 313: Remove the Native-Header Generation Tool (javah)

Run the below command on `NativeTest.java` in the current directory: 

```bash
javac -h . NativeTest.java  
```

Compiler should produce a header file called `NativeTest.h` in the current directory. 

Check contents of the header file by doing: 

```bash
cat NativeTest.sh
```

The header file should contain the below:

```cpp
    /* DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - it is machine generated */
    #include <jni.h>
    /* Header for class NativeTest */
    
    #ifndef _Included_NativeTest
    #define _Included_NativeTest
    #ifdef __cplusplus
    extern "C" {
    #endif
    /*
     * Class:     NativeTest
     * Method:    sayHello
     * Signature: ()V
     */
    JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_NativeTest_sayHello
      (JNIEnv *, jobject);
    
    #ifdef __cplusplus
    }
    #endif
    #endif
```
